quote-source: Rowena Bastin Bennett, Thanksgiving Magic, The Random House Book of Poetry for Children (1983)
quote-text:
Thanksgiving Day I like to see
Our cook perform her witchery.
[…]
Oh, some like magic made by wands,
Â  And some read magic out of books,
And some like fairy spells and charms
Â  But I like magic made by cooks!
